Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Berny
Reviews.Content: Esta muy bien el telefono, tiene muchas cosas interesantes, lo unico es que no tiene 3G, pero por lo demas, estoy a gusto

Reviews.Title: Samsung Marvel s5560
Reviews.Author: keith_zerine23
Reviews.Content: I ordered my S5560 last June 29. And it was very fast, i received it just after a week (it's way faster than the expected delivery date.)The phone is awesome and I am enjoying it right now!I would probably make another transaction with parkrowwireless really soon!

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM Quad Band 850/900/1800/1900
3.0 inches TFT resistive touchscreen, 240 x 400 pixels
Memory Card Slot: microSD (TransFlash), up to 16GB
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g, Bluetooth with stereo, Stereo FM radio with RDS, MP3/WAV/eAAC+ player
Talk Time: Up to 9 h 30 min, Stand-by Time: Up to 620 h
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S5560 Marvel Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Cell Phone with 5 MP camera, Touch Screen, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth -- International Version with No Warranty (Black)
